official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating May 21, 1983 as "National Sakharov Day".
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Designates May 21, 1983, as National Sakharov Day. Authorizes and requests the President to: (1) call upon all nations to designate May 21, 1983, as National Sakharov Day; (2) urge the Soviet Union to permit the Sakharovs to freely choose their place of residence; and (3) direct the American delegation to the United Nations to introduce a resolution in the General Assembly calling upon that body to designate May 21, 1983, as International Sakharov Day.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating May 21, 1983 as "National Sakharov Day".
